General.Name: Loop Energy Inc
General.Description: Loop Energy Inc. develops, manufactures, and supplies hydrogen fuel cells to vehicle original equipment manufacturers and power generation system manufacturers in Europe, North America, China, and rest of Asia-Pacific. It offers its fuel cell systems for the electrification of commercial vehicles and mobile equipment, such as buses, trucks, logistic and delivery vans, material handling equipment, tractors, port stackers, and transport machinery. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Burnaby, Canada.
General.Address: 2880 Production Way, Burnaby, BC, Canada, V5A 4T6
